definition[0]: the place in a computer email program where new messages arrive
example[0]: I had 130 emails in my inbox this morning.
definition[1]: a container on an office desk that is used to hold letters, documents etc that you must deal with
definition[2]: the place on a computer where new email messages arrive
example[1]: An email filter will stop your inbox from filling up with spam.
definition[3]: a flat container used to hold letters, papers etc that need to be dealt with
